entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming north 30 near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 March 2023
